Question
========
Показатель $R^2_{adj}$ можно вычислить по формуле


Answerlist
----------
*  $R^2_{adj} = (-1)\cdot \frac{k-1}{n-k} + R^2 \cdot \frac{n-1}{n-k}$
*  $R^2_{adj} = \frac{k-1}{n-k} + R^2 \cdot \frac{n-1}{n-k}$
*  $R^2_{adj} = \frac{k-1}{n-k} - R^2 \cdot \frac{n-1}{n-k}$
*  $R^2_{adj} = \frac{k-1}{n-k} + R^2 \cdot \frac{n-k}{n-1}$
*  $R^2_{adj} = \frac{k}{n-k} + R^2 \cdot \frac{n-1}{n-k}$
*  $R^2_{adj} = \frac{n-k}{k-1} + R^2 \cdot \frac{n-1}{n-k}$
